verses.verse: And he <S%H7200>shewed<s%> me <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H7854>Satan<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> at his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> to <S%H7853>resist<s%> him. Satan: that is, an adversary to: Heb. to be his adversary

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7854>Satan<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1605>rebuke<s%> thee, O <S%H7854>Satan<s%>; even the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that hath <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H1605>rebuke<s%> thee: is not this a <S%H181>brand<s%> <S%H5337>plucked<s%> out of the <S%H784>fire<s%>?

And he <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>spake<s%> unto those that <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H6674>filthy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> from him. And unto him he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7200>Behold<s%>, I have caused thine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> from thee, and I will <S%H3847>clothe<s%> thee with change of <S%H4254>raiment<s%>.

And I <S%H559>said<s%>, Let them <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H2889>fair<s%> <S%H6797>mitre<s%> upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>. So they <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H2889>fair<s%> <S%H6797>mitre<s%> upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>, and <S%H3847>clothed<s%> him with <S%H899>garments<s%>. And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> stood <S%H5975>by<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; If thou wilt <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and if thou wilt <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4931>charge<s%>, then thou shalt also <S%H1777>judge<s%> my <S%H1004>house<s%>, and shalt also <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H2691>courts<s%>, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee places to <S%H4108>walk<s%> among these that stand <S%H5975>by<s%>. charge: or, ordinance places: Heb. walks

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> now, O <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%>, thou, and thy <S%H7453>fellows<s%> that <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee: for they are <S%H582>men<s%> wondered <S%H4159>at<s%>: for, behold, I will bring <S%H935>forth<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> the <S%H6780>BRANCH<s%>. wondered: Heb. of wonder, or, sign

For behold the <S%H68>stone<s%> that I have <S%H5414>laid<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>; upon <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> shall be <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: behold, I will <S%H6605>engrave<s%> the <S%H6603>graving<s%> thereof, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, and I will <S%H4185>remove<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of that <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, shall ye <S%H7121>call<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbour<s%> under the <S%H1612>vine<s%> and under the fig <S%H8384>tree<s%>.
